changeSet.sql: UPDATE material_sample SET material_sample_type = ( CASE WHEN (material_sample_type_id = (SELECT id from material_sample_type where uuid = '3a001690-7008-45be-b6a8-cc1808eefbc6')) THEN 'WHOLE_ORGANISM'::material_sample_type WHEN (material_sample_type_id = (SELECT id from material_sample_type where uuid = '6c2aedd0-220e-41de-b0e9-d36f0c6e09b9')) THEN 'ORGANISM_PART'::material_sample_type WHEN (material_sample_type_id = (SELECT id from material_sample_type where uuid = '24d0a216-5967-4bb0-875a-47655e7c0ae8')) THEN 'MIXED_ORGANISMS'::material_sample_type WHEN (material_sample_type_id = (SELECT id from material_sample_type where uuid = '3426a6db-99db-4f9d-9c26-eaed1d6906e5')) THEN 'MOLECULAR_SAMPLE'::material_sample_type END);
